reqs: This Directed Study is for students who have already completed EOSC 326 (achieved 90%+ grade) and would like further study in paleontology. Approval will be dependent on instructors availability. Please contact Professor Stuart Sutherland at ssutherland@eos.ubc.ca.
description: Investigation of a topic to be agreed upon by a member of the faculty and the student. Permission of an undergraduate advisor and of the supervising faculty member is required before registration.
